Detailed Description

This class models the exact solution of a test problem for the Poisson equation in the two-dimensional ring-shaped domain ; cf. Sect. 7.2.3 in Manuel's PhD thesis. The solution consists of four singularity functions (as in eq. (4.4.4) in Manuel's PhD thesis) situated around the re-entrant corners. The whole funtion is plotted in Fig.7.22 (left).
